resources.string: 🚀 Making learning fun for your child

"Edu-help Learning app is developed by Santosh Kumar(ER). 

" "📍 This application is developed for the education purpose.
" "Its aim to provide best quality of contents from all over the web to develop their basic concept." "📍 Language used in this application is so simple and easy to understand. 
" "Contents are taken from the various resourses from 🌐 like Google, youtube and various other websites. 
" "💻 Happy learning. "
